name: ircd-hybrid-7-bg
short_description: ircd-hybrid-7-bg is feature-rich hybrid mod, with number of unique capabilities,  most notable of which are: host cloaking, flexible vhosts, full cyrillic support,  versatile chan- and umodes, server-side notify, client SSL support, drone bot  autokline,
